title: 2023 Montenegrin legislative election
text:
MethodologyElection Targeting DashboardsAbout Us


In collaboration with Who Targets Me, we monitored 91 political advertisers in Montenegro during the 2023 Montenegrin legislative election to better understand how campaigns use different targeting methods made available by Meta. To do this, we used data from the Meta Ad Library, using the new â€˜Audienceâ€™ data which gives some detail on how pages target their ads.
To better understand the election, we kept only advertisers who:

Advertised in the last 7 days (May 31st - Jun 6th 2023)
Advertised in the last 30 days (May 8th - Jun 6th 2023)


Note: Meta only provides 7, 30 and 90 days windows for the targeting data in their Ad Library. Metaâ€™s data also lags by a few days. Report will be updated as soon as new data is available.



A list of election dashboards:

ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡ª Montenegrin parliamentary elections, 2023 (11 June 2023)









Fabio Votta


Ph.D. candidate in Political Communication at the University of Amsterdam who studies (online) political microtargeting and its usage around the world.
Link





Who Targets Me


Grassroots activist group advocating for transparency in the digital age by monitoring political adverts on social media and their impact on democracy.
Link

title: Untitled
text:
Running Code
When you click the Render button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

1 + 1

[1] 2


You can add options to executable code like this


[1] 4


The echo: false option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).

title: About
text:
There are four main questions that we are trying to tackle with our current version of the dashboard:

How many ads are the Dutch political parties placing on the platforms that we look at?
How much money are the parties spending on each platform?
How many people are reached through these ads?
How are the political ads targeted towards individuals?


Disclaimer: the data shown in this dashboard is based on the platformâ€™s respective ad libraries. For this reason the data shown here might not reflect the full picture nor all political ads that were targeted at voters.

Visit politieke-advertenties.nl for more info (Website is in Dutch).





Want to see how political parties target you? Sign up with our partners at Who Targets Me and download the gratis browser plugin to see how parties on Facebook use your data:
https://whotargets.me/
